name: EDGY
description:
No reason, no justification.

Just shoot, slice, and sometimes break some necks in this hard-hitting FPS.

Beware, one hit and you are out, and so are your enemies.

--

WASD LSHIFT - MOVEMENT

LMB - ATTACK

F - PICK/DROP WEAPONS

Q E - LEAN (no seriously, lean)

--

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Studio.
